QuestData.Title: Felspine the Greater
QuestData.Description: Gnomus knows about the massive diemetradon and plans to eat it! He must have been able to see what I could see through the eyes of his arcano-scorp. Look, there's no time to explain. He's crazy and that craziness is going to cost us the closest thing we've got to a fireproof jumpsuit.$B$BGet back to the lava flow near Baa'ri and track down Felspine the Greater. Once you find it, kill it and bring me back its hide.$B$BDon't try and reason with me, $n. I'm well past that point.
QuestData.LogDescription: Researcher Tiorus at Shadowmoon Village in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to kill Felspine the Greater and recover Felspine's Hide.
QuestData.CompletionText: Snap to it! That gnome's appetite knows no limit!
QuestData.RewardText: At last! Total protection against lava is mine! Of course you get a cut of this technology too, $N. You've earned it!
